long_description: Jump-start your morning with a fresh-brewed cup of coffee using the GSI Java Press coffee maker. Patented split ring plunger securely traps grounds so you can enjoy delicious ''mud-free'' coffee. Crystal-clear polypropylene carafe is lightweight and shatter resistant so you can take it just about anywhere; BPA free. Double-wall, insulated lid holds in heat while brewing and serving. Insulating EVA sleeve with webbing handle removes easily for cleaning.
short_description: Jump-start your morning with a fresh-brewed cup of coffee using the GSI Java Press coffee maker.
